mapper.select: SELECT u.id as userId, u.username, u.nickname, u.avatar, u.gender, u.signature, f.remark, f.muted FROM friend f INNER JOIN user u ON f.friend_id = u.id WHERE f.user_id = #{userId} AND f.status = 1 AND u.status = 1 ORDER BY f.create_time DESC
